title: A true report of the priuate colloquy betweene M. Smith, ali√¢s Norrice, and M. VValker held in the presence of two vvorthy knights, and of a few other gentlemen, some Catholikes, some Protestants : with a briefe confutation of the false, and adulterated summe, which M. Walker, pastour of S. Iohn Euangelist in Watling-streete, hath diuulged of the same.
author: S. N. (Sylvester Norris), 1572-1630.
